thread.title: Matthew McConaughey Is Bald and Overweight on 'Gold' Set
thread.title_full: Matthew McConaughey Is Bald and Overweight on 'Gold' Set

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Matthew McConaughey Is Bald and Overweight on 'Gold' Set
text:
Comments The actor looks unrecognizable on the set of his upcoming movie as he sports a balding head, beaky nose, protruding teeth and prosthetic belly. 
Matthew McConaughey looked unrecognizable on set of his new movie " Gold (2016) " on Sunday, October 4 in New York City. The hunky actor transformed himself to Kenny Wells by wearing a balding head, beaky nose, protruding teeth and prosthetic belly. Matthew donned a cheap and unflattering grey suit with tropical print silk tie and brown shoes. At one point, an assistant could be seen adjusting the 45-year-old actor's false teeth as he waited patiently between takes. He was seen puffing cigarette while toting around a briefcase. Matthew also filmed a scene with co-star Bryce Dallas Howard . Bryce looked beautiful in a gold 80s-style dress which showed her cleavage and long legs. The " Jurassic World " actress sported red lipstick and her hair was styled in small curls. She completed her look with gold accessories, a box clutch and strappy heels. Directed by Stephen Gaghan, "Gold" is based on a true story of the Bre-X Mineral Corporation mining scandal and is set in the early '90s. The film centers on Kenny Wells, a struggling businessman who is trying to get back on his feet. He later teams up with a luckless geologist ( Edgar Ramirez ) in an effort to find gold deep in the uncharted jungles of Indonesia.
